info.name: Twitter Dark CALM Blue Glow(New Twitter Layout)
info.description:
I just started using twitter and found it very bright...So I did this dark-blue glow skin..Hope you like it..Cheers

Don't hesitate to share your views, as to improve this amateur's work.
info.additionalInfo:
Update: March 5th, 2012. Adapted to new twitter layout. 

Update: Removed rotation and add translation http://www.tumblr.com/photo/1280/12243066496/1/tumblr_lu1ik72orO1r5jn71

Update: added a rotation effect for tweets..if you dont like it, remove it(I highlighted its location in the code)
